A wristwatch can be used as a smartwatch by syncing it with a smartphone app to receive notifications, control music, and even make calls.
A wristwatch can be used as a personal safety device by setting up alerts to notify emergency contacts in case of an emergency.
A wristwatch can be used as a time-lapse camera by attaching a small camera to the watchband and setting a timer to capture photos at regular intervals.
A wristwatch can be used as a personal weather station by using its built-in weather app to monitor the current weather and forecast for the day.
A wristwatch can be used as a personal fitness tracker by using its built-in fitness tracker to monitor your heart rate, steps taken, and other fitness metrics.
